00021 // No conversion  - send the SMS as it is
00022 #define CONVERSION_NO    0
00023 // Text conversion - convert the SMS to the GSM character set
00024 #define CONVERSION_TEXT  1
00025 // Define the size of this packet.

00049 class SMSSendRequestPacket : public RequestPacket 
00050 {
00051    public:
00052 
00053       enum smsType_t {
00054          // normal text message
00055          SMSTYPE_TEXT         = 0, 
00056          // normal text message, but data is in HEX representation, 
00057          // no conversion is done
00058          SMSTYPE_TEXT_HEX     = 1,
00059          // WAP Push, Service Indication, see Wap Forum specification 
00060          // WAP-167-ServiceInd-20010731-a
00061          SMSTYPE_WAP_PUSH_SI  = 2,
00062       };

00074                               uint32 origIP, uint16 origPort);

00315 inline SMSSendRequestPacket::smsType_t 
00316 SMSSendRequestPacket::getSMSType() {
00317    return (smsType_t)readByte(REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE + 2);
00318 }
